abstract: Burnt Point, 25-acre Hamptons estate on Georgica Pond in Wainscott, LI, will be listed for $95 million.
lead_paragraph: An 18,000-square-foot house in Wainscott, N.Y., with more than 2,000 feet of frontage on secluded Georgica Pond, is about to go on the market.

headline.main: A Sprawling Hamptons Estate Offered at $95 Million

snippet: An 18,000-square-foot house in Wainscott, N.Y., with more than 2,000 feet of frontage on secluded Georgica Pond, is about to go on the market.
